property.name: problem.summary
property.value: Method Indexer.addRelatedEntryFields(Document, Object) has been moved into RelatedEntryIndexer. Indexer.reindexDDMStructures(List<Long>) has been moved into DDMStructureIndexer. Indexer.getQueryString(SearchContext, Query) has been removed, in favor of calling SearchEngineUtil.getQueryString(SearchContext, Query)
